org.rapidcontext.util

Class StringUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.rapidcontext.util.StringUtil

  • public class StringUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    A set of utility methods for handling strings and characters.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Per Cederberg

    • Method Detail

      • isAscii

        public static boolean isAscii(char c)
        Checks if a character belongs to the printable ASCII set. Any character code between 32 and 126 is considered inside this set.
        Parameters:
        c - the character to check
        Returns:
        true if the character is printable ASCII, or false otherwise

      • isAscii

        public static boolean isAscii(java.lang.String str)
        Checks if all characters in a string belongs to the printable ASCII set. Any character code between 32 and 126 is considered inside this set.
        Parameters:
        str - the string to check
        Returns:
        true if the string is printable ASCII, or false otherwise

      • isIsoLatin1

        public static boolean isIsoLatin1(char c)
        Checks if a character belongs to the printable ISO-8859-1 set. Any character in the printable ASCII set or with a character code between 160 and 255 in considered inside this set.
        Parameters:
        c - the character to check
        Returns:
        true if the character is printable ISO-8859-1, or false otherwise

      • isIsoLatin1

        public static boolean isIsoLatin1(java.lang.String str)
        Checks if all characters in a string belongs to the printable ISO-8859-1 set. Any character in the printable ASCII set or with a character code between 160 and 255 in considered inside this set.
        Parameters:
        str - the string to check
        Returns:
        true if the string is printable ISO-8859-1, or false otherwise

      • isNumber

        public static boolean isNumber(char c)
        Checks if a character is a numeric ASCII character.
        Parameters:
        c - the character to check
        Returns:
        true if the character is a number, or false otherwise

      • isNumber

        public static boolean isNumber(java.lang.String str)
        Checks if all characters in a string are numeric ASCII characters. The string must also be at least one character long and no whitespace characters are accepted.
        Parameters:
        str - the string to check
        Returns:
        true if the string is numeric, or false otherwise

      • toHex

        public static java.lang.String toHex(char chr)
        Returns a 4 digit hexadecimal representation of a character.
        Parameters:
        chr - the character to convert
        Returns:
        the hexadecimal character code

      • escapeProperty

        public static java.lang.String escapeProperty(char chr)
        Returns an escaped property file value for the specified input character. This method will return character escapes for backslash, tab and newline. It will also return a Unicode escape for any non-ASCII character.
        Parameters:
        chr - the character to convert
        Returns:
        the valid property text string

      • escapeProperty

        public static java.lang.String escapeProperty(java.lang.String str)
        Returns an escaped property file value for the specified input string. This method will return character escapes for backslash, tab and newline. It will also return a Unicode escape for any non-ASCII character.
        Parameters:
        str - the string to convert
        Returns:
        the valid property text string

      • escapeXml

        public static java.lang.String escapeXml(char chr)
        Returns properly escaped XML for the specified input character. This method will return an XML character entities for all non-ASCII characters as well as the reserved XML characters.
        Parameters:
        chr - the character to convert
        Returns:
        the valid XML string

      • escapeXml

        public static java.lang.String escapeXml(java.lang.String str)
        Returns properly escaped XML for the specified input string. This method will add XML character entities for all non-ASCII characters as well as the reserved XML characters.
        Parameters:
        str - the string to convert
        Returns:
        the valid XML string

      • first

        public static java.lang.String first(java.lang.String str1,
                                     java.lang.String str2,
                                     java.lang.String str3)
        Returns the first non-empty value of the argument strings.
        Parameters:
        str1 - the first string to check
        str2 - the second string to check
        str3 - the third string to check
        Returns:
        the first non-empty value of the argument strings, or the last string value

      • match

        public static java.lang.String match(java.lang.String str,
                                     java.util.regex.Pattern re)
        Returns the first match of a regular expression from a string.
        Parameters:
        str - the string to match
        re - the compiled regular expression
        Returns:
        the matched substring, or null if no match was found
